segments.section_title: A New Path to Healthier Levels

visual_assets.name: confident patient
visual_assets.purpose: represents a patient achieving better health and peace of mind
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon illustration of a human figure walking confidently, minimalistic, optimistic pose, bright colors

visual_assets.name: clear path
visual_assets.purpose: symbolizes a path to recovery or better health outcomes
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat illustration of a winding clear path or road, light grey color, cartoon style

visual_assets.name: healthy pancreas icon
visual_assets.prompt: clean minimal medical icon of a healthy pancreas, calm green color, flat cartoon style

visual_assets.name: downward trend arrow
visual_assets.purpose: indicates a significant decrease in triglyceride levels
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat icon of a large downward-pointing arrow, bright green color, representing reduction, cartoon style
